attributes.action: The British people voted to be 'Completely out' of the Political EU.
attributes.additional_details:
The Government are mandated to carry out the instructions of the British people. In no way did we vote to 'Partially' leave the EU. We want no part of the Political Union. OUT means OUT!
https://www.rt.com/uk/352979-brexit-free-movement-market/

https://www.theguardian.com/world/2016/jul/24/brexit-deal-free-movement-exemption-seven-years
attributes.background: We voted to leave the EU. Staying in the single market with free movement of people is non negotiable, regardless of any kind of  'Emergency brake' or not.We didn't vote for a 7 year emergency break! The British people do not accept any kind of deal which keeps us tied to the Political EU.
